str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
(held precious, hence) precious, honored, honorable in rank. From en and time; valued.
(a) (as adj.) enslaved, (b) (as noun) a (male) slave. From deo; a slave.
A centurion of the Roman army. Or hekatontarchos hek-at-on'-tar-khos; from hekaton and archo; the captain of one hundred men.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Badly, evilly, wrongly. From kakos; badly.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A strengthened form of melo; to intend, i.e. Be about to be, do, or suffer something.
To end, finish, die, complete. From a presumed derivative of teleo; to finish life, i.e. Expire.
